snippet: Our own lack of focus was reflected in Gov. Pat Quinn’s State of the State address, which had no unifying theme or call to action.
lead_paragraph: Our own lack of focus was reflected in Gov. Pat Quinn’s State of the State address, which had no unifying theme or call to action.

headline.seo: From Governor Quinn, Some Feel-Good Oratory
headline.main: Instead of Speaking Unpleasant Truths, Some Feel-Good Oratory
headline.print_headline: Instead of Speaking Unpleasant Truths, Some Feel-Good Oratory
